explanation: [0-0] A cup of coffee sits on a wooden table. In the background, there are two small tables. The left one holds a bag of coffee beans and a cup, while the right one has a small coffee machine and some other coffee-making tools, including a grinder and a measuring spoon. Some coffee beans are scattered on the table.

[0-10] A hand holding a metal spoon filled with white foam appears from above. The hand uses the spoon to dot the foam onto the surface of the coffee, creating four white dots. The hand continues dotting the foam onto the coffee surface, now with eight white dots. Then, a hand holding a white bottle with a pointed tip filled with a dark liquid appears. The hand uses the dark liquid from the bottle to make a dot in the center of six of the white dots on the coffee surface. The hand continues using the dark liquid to draw circles around the center dot, turning it into a bullseye pattern.
